law.history: Repealed 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 14, effective March 23, 1976. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 1. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 950-3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Appeals in cases involving less than $2500.
